Package org.cpnsim.util

Class ScoredHostsManager

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.util.ScoredHostsManager
public class ScoredHostsManager extends Object
The manager that manages the scored hosts. It contains the priority queue of the scored hosts and the score host history map.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu
